name: 末路江湖: 叛道 (Jianghu's End: The Renegade's Path)-V2
description: A text-based RPG set in the declining years of the Da Qian Dynasty. As the second-in-command of the Red Dragon Stronghold, you must navigate a world of collapsing ideals, make difficult choices between loyalty and morality, and witness the end of an era.
